The ILI consultation rate is the ratio of patients presenting ILI to all patient-visits and does not measure true influenza incidence rate in the catchment population. Previously, we showed that conversion to per-capita infection rate can be made based on Bayes’ rule [ 65, 67]. Briefly, ILI+ (here, ILI+ = A(H1N1)+, A(H3N2)+, or B+) estimates the probability that a person seeking medical attention, m, has influenza, i.e., p( i| m).
